Listening To Users

Quiz Time

Which line is longer?

Which line is longer?

I stole that from a 2013 talk by Christian Heilmann.

Microfeedback

What sorts of feedback do we get?

I can't find something on the site.

I hate surveys.

I am having trouble with remote access.

You don't have the Journal of the Study of Journalistic Studies?!?!

Why do I need 10 clicks to get an article from UC-eLinks?

I can't add money to my print card.

I returned a book but the Library still thinks I have it.

Did you notice…

Most of those things weren't about the website.

The user experience is about the Library, not (just) the website.
